TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFrameworkInputElement implements class System.Windows.IInputElement

Docs.summary: Declares a namescope contract for framework elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This interface is not intended for implementation. Its purpose is to support the WPF framework-level infrastructure. To implement a namescope, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.INameScope>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of an element.
Docs.value: The element name, which is unique in the namescope and can be used as an identifier for certain operations.
Docs.returns: The element name, which is unique in the namescope and can be used as an identifier for certain operations.
